program.title: Web Development Internship
program.progloc: School of Computer Science, XYZ University
program.description: This OJT program provides students with hands-on experience in web development, equipping them with practical skills and knowledge in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Participants will work on real-world projects and collaborate with experienced developers to create responsive and dynamic websites.

program.title: Marketing Internship
program.description: The Marketing Internship provides students with practical experience in various aspects of marketing, including market research, social media management, and campaign development. Participants will work closely with the marketing team and gain valuable insights into the field while contributing to real-world projects.
